title: Riddle of the Week #14: Elon Musk's Interview Riddle
text:
Riddle of the Week #14: Elon Musk's Interview Riddle 
Difficulty level: Moderate By Jay Bennett Feb 2, 2017 This week's riddle is one of Elon Musk's favorites, according to Ashlee Vance's 2015 biography, Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future . The billionaire tech magnate has been known to pose this very question during job interviews at SpaceX. Although now that the word is out, he has surely come up with a new brain teaser. Problem You're standing on the surface of the Earth. You walk one mile south, one mile west, and one mile north. You end up exactly where you started.
